name: Geh wie ne Paprika
description:
A tower defense game created by Harpunen Harry & Lapis at the GameJam of our university.

Tipp: Enable Fullscreen

Also this game was not designed to run in a browser so sorry for bugs ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

Controls:

  • Left click to select dinosaurs and place them
  • Right click to rotate them
  • Esc to exit the game

Beware the masked peppers. They can only be attacked after the flying dinosaurs shit on them.
